Package com.opportunity.ui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Button
    This class models one button on the screen.
    Card
    This class models one Card Label on the screen.
    CardImageLoader
    This class loads the card images for the Opportunity UI.
    ClickAction
    This class models a Click Action.
    GameTable
    Models a game table.
    OpportunityUI
    A class that models one Opportunity Game UI.
    PlayerPane
    This class represents the common elements of each player's display.
